Arnold Abbey Mensah (amụrụ n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2001) bụ onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dị ka onye na-agbachitere ndị otu Accra Great Olympics nke Ghana Premier League. A mụrụ ya na Mamprobi na mpaghara Greater Accra nke Ghana, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ghana, legon, ebe ọ gụrụ Dental Laboratory Science ma gbaa bọọlụ n'otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ.

Abbey-Mensah bụ nwa amaala Mamprobi, ógbè dịpụrụ adịpụ nke Accra na Greater Accra Region nke Ghana nke a maara maka ịmepụta ndị egwuregwu nwere nkà gụnyere onye bụbu onyeisi ndị otu mba Ghana Stephen Appiah, Peter Ofori-Quaye na onye bụbu onye mmeri ịkụ ọkpọ ụwa Azumah Nelson. Ọ gara Mahadum nke Ghana, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere Bachelor of Science na Dental Laboratory Science.

Abbey-Mensah gbara bọọlụ na Mahadum Ghana (UG) mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na mahadum maka nzere ya. Klọb Accra Great Olympics nke dị na Teshie nyochara ya ma chọpụta ya n'oge egwuregwu Ghana Universities Sports Association (GUSA) nke UG kwadoro na Jenụwarị 2020. N'oge egwuregwu ahụ, ọ pụtara na egwiuregwu atọ wee nye otu goolu nakwa otu enyemaka.

Abbey-Mensah n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2020, tụpụ 2020 China Premier League, ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ atọ na Accra Great Olympics. A kpọrọ aha ya na ndepụta ndị otu klọb maka oge ahụ. O mere mpụta nke mbụ ya n'egwuregwu mbụ nke oge ahụ, na-egwu nkeji ịrị itoolu zuru ezu ebe ha nwere otu goolu megide Medeama SC ndị nwetakwara otu goolu. N'abalị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba 2020, ụbọchị egwuregwu nke abụọ, ọ gbara nkeji iri itoolu zuru ezu iji nyere egwuregwu Olimpik aka imeri Legon Cities FC.
